page.title: 02A Day in the Life of ...
page.content: {A Day in the life of Anne-Marie {Burgess I got up at 7.45a.m. I got dressed and had a breakfast of toast,cornflakes and orange-juice.I then washed,brushed my teeth and combed my hair.Afterwards I went over to the shops with my family.I bought sweets and went for my friends Leanne and Tanya to go to school at 9.15.For dinner at school I had bacon and chips followed by chocolate cake and white sauce.During morning and afternoon playtimes I played netball with my friends.After school my Nan took my sister and me to Ebbw Vale Leisure Centre by car.We went in the pool for a swim and then Nan took us home in time for supper.I had beans on toast and got ready for bed.I read for half an hour and went to sleep.
